nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member lagrPartTrack is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the lagrPartTrack analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_restart_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the lagrPartTrack analysis member should use to perform restarts.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_input_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the lagrPartTrack analysis member should read only in a non-restart run.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_filter_number
nml_option.description: Number of times to apply filtering operation.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_reset_criteria
nml_option.description: Specify whether particles should not be reset ('none'), be reset on a timer for each particle ('particle_time'), be reset on config_AM_lagrPartTrack_reset_time_globally value ('global_time'), be reset based on regions ('region'), or be reset for all conditions ('all').

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_region_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that has region arrays resetOutsideRegionMaskValue1 and resetInsideRegionMaskValue1 for region-based particle resets.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_reset_if_outside_region
nml_option.description: Specify whether particles should be reset when they leave the resetOutsideRegionMaskValue1 mask.

nml_option.name: config_AM_lagrPartTrack_reset_if_inside_region
nml_option.description: Specify whether particles should be reset when they enter the resetInsideRegionMaskValue1 mask.

dim.name: nParticles
dim.description: The total number of particles in the simlulation.

dim.name: nBuoyancySurfaces
dim.description: The total number of buoyancy surfaces on which to interpolate velocity.

package.name: lagrPartTrackAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the lagrPartTrack analysis member.

var.name: resetOutsideRegionMaskValue1
var.description: Mask for particle resets that leave this particular region (specified by 1)

var.name: resetInsideRegionMaskValue1
var.description: Mask for particle resets that enter this particular region (specified by 1)

var.name: globalResetTimeValue
var.description: Time in s for a global reset.

var.name: uVertexVelocity
var.description: recostructed u horizontal velocity at vertices

var.name: vVertexVelocity
var.description: recostructed v horizontal velocity at vertices

var.name: wVertexVelocity
var.description: recostructed w horizontal velocity at vertices

var.name: buoyancy
var.description: buoyancy values at cell mid points, currently proxy for density

var.name: cellOwnerBlock
var.description: designates ownership of cell in terms of computational block

var.name: filteredVelocityW
var.description: filtered u horizontal velocity at cells

var.name: filteredVelocityV
var.description: filtered v horizontal velocity at cells

var.name: filteredVelocityU
var.description: filtered w horizontal velocity at cells

var.name: buoyancySurfaceVelocityZonal
var.description: horizontal zonal velocity on buoyancy surface

var.name: buoyancySurfaceVelocityMeridional
var.description: horizontal meridional velocity on buoyancy surface

var.name: buoyancySurfaceDepth
var.description: depth of buoyancy surface

var.name: buoyancySurfaceValues
var.description: definition of buoyancy surfaces in terms of potential density

var.name: wachspressAreaB
var.description: cached polygon subarea B_i used in Wachspess calculation

var.name: ioBlock
var.description: input / output Proc for particle

var.name: currentBlock
var.description: current block a particle is on

var.name: currentCell
var.description: current cell a particle is on

var.name: indexToParticleID
var.description: designates global ID for a particle

var.name: xParticle
var.description: x location of horizontal particle position

var.name: yParticle
var.description: y location of horizontal particle position

var.name: zParticle
var.description: z location of horizontal particle position

var.name: zLevelParticle
var.description: z-level for vertical elevation of particle position

var.name: xParticleReset
var.description: reset x location of horizontal particle position

var.name: yParticleReset
var.description: reset y location of horizontal particle position

var.name: zParticleReset
var.description: reset z location of horizontal particle position

var.name: zLevelParticleReset
var.description: reset z-level for vertical elevation of particle position

var.name: currentBlockReset
var.description: reset block for a particle

var.name: currentCellReset
var.description: reset cell for a particle

var.name: timeSinceReset
var.description: time (in seconds) since last particle reset

var.name: resetTime
var.description: reset timer (in seconds) for particles

var.name: numTimesReset
var.description: flag to specify how many times the particle was reset

var.name: vertexReconstMethod
var.description: type of vertex reconstruction method, with possible_values='RBFlinear(1)' as ENUMs

var.name: timeIntegration
var.description: type of temporal interpolation with possible_values='EE(1), RK2(2), RK4(4)' as ENUMs

var.name: horizontalTreatment
var.description: select type of horizontal treatment to be used, with possible_values='wachspress' as ENUMs

var.name: verticalTreatment
var.description: select type of vertical treatment to be used, with possible_values='indexLevel','fixedZLevel','passiveFloat','buoyancySurface','argoFloat' (ENUM)

var.name: indexLevel
var.description: 0 if particle is fixed, or index level if particle is free-floating

var.name: dtParticle
var.description: Any positive real value, but limited by CFL condition.

var.name: buoyancyParticle
var.description: buoyancy values for particle, currently proxy for density

var.name: transfered
var.description: flag to monitor if the particle was transfered

var.name: sumU
var.description: summed velocity: \sum_i U_i

var.name: sumV
var.description: summed velocity: \sum_i V_i

var.name: sumUU
var.description: summed energy: \sum_i U*U

var.name: sumUV
var.description: summed energy: \sum_i U*V

var.name: sumVV
var.description: summed energy: \sum_i V*V

var.name: lonVel
var.description: u velocity of particle - zonal direction

var.name: latVel
var.description: v velocity of particle - meridional direction

var.name: ucReconstructX
var.description: reconstructed cell center velocity- x component

var.name: ucReconstructY
var.description: reconstructed cell center velocity- y component

var.name: ucReconstructZ
var.description: reconstructed cell center velocity- z component

var.name: ucTemp
var.description: cell velocity

var.name: ucX
var.description: cell velocity- x component

var.name: ucY
var.description: cell velocity- y component

var.name: ucZ
var.description: cell velocity- z component

var.name: uvX
var.description: vertex velocity- x component

var.name: uvY
var.description: vertex velocity- y component

var.name: uvZ
var.description: vertex velocity- z component

var.name: ucReconstructMeridional
var.description: reconstructed cell center velocity- meridional component

var.name: ucReconstructZonal
var.description: reconstructed cell center velocity- zonal component

var.name: boundaryVertexGlobal
var.description: Mask for determining boundary vertices, but global. A boundary vertex has at least one inactive cell neighboring it.

var.name: boundaryCellGlobal
var.description: Mask for determining boundary cells, but global. A boundary cell has at least one inactive cell neighboring it.
